title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: GET API Step
description: Definition of a GET API endpoint for listing all pets

title: No Events Emitted
description: Notice that this step doesn't emit any events, unlike the CREATE step. GET operations are typically simple read operations that don't need to trigger other processes.

title: Simple Handler
description: A straightforward handler that doesn't require request parameters

title: Data Listing
description: Retrieve all pets from the store and return them as a list

title: Handler
description: The handler function that executes when the GET request is made

title: HTTP Response
description: Returns a successful response with the list of pets
